resp = client.eql.search(
    index="my-data-stream",
    filter={
        "range": {
            "@timestamp": {
                "gte": "now-1d/d",
                "lt": "now/d"
            }
        }
    },
    query="\n    file where (file.type == \"file\" and file.name == \"cmd.exe\")\n  ",
)
print(resp)
